name: MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION OF PRIVATE PHOTOGRAMMETRIST SURVEYORS
description: Trade association for geospatial mapping, surveying, satellite sensing
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on mapping, surveying, GPS, and GIS data collection.
